title: Ranking the Best of 2024: Who Gets Your Vote for the Vélo d’Or Prize?
content:
Kristen Faulkner and Matteo Jorgenson among the finalists for the Vélo d’Or prize for the top international riders in 2024: Who’s your top pick?

Read the full article at Ranking the Best of 2024: Who Gets Your Vote for the Vélo d’Or Prize? on Velo.
author: ahood
